Title: Enacts the utility shutoff protection act
Summary: Protects residential customers from utility service shutoffs due to non-payment during summer and winter periods of extreme heat or cold; allows such utility services to be discontinued for non-payment outside such periods; requires an annual report to be submitted to the governor and legislature and posted publicly online.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to enacting the "utility shutoff protection act"
